query:
SELECT tc.id, tc.templateId, ct.name as templateName, t.name as taskName 
FROM taskChecklists tc 
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id 
LEFT JOIN tasks t ON tc.taskId = t.id 
LIMIT 10;
